name: OpiumCombinations
title: Opium Combinations
description: This value set includes semantic clinical drugs (SCD) and generic pack (GPCK) RxNorm codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for medications that are Schedules II and III opium combination medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify a medication for opium with multiple ingredient .),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represents opium tincture because of its morphine content. Excludes concepts that represent schedule I, unscheduled, nonprescribable, non-human, and inactive opium combination medications.)
